Articles.Content:
PS4

After performing an EVA, all staging on the craft collapses into a single stage. I can replicate this bug with every EVA.

 

PS - There are no console versions listed on the bug tracker site. Should we list bugs here?

A bug tracker label is coming, for now please put the console type in the title

This is a known issue that is solved on PC, and will be fixed on console as soon as possible.
This is an XBone issue as well. It also removes your staged engine fuel display.

Happening for me on the PS4.

 

Had me stuck for a while trying to figure out what the heck had happened.  I was about to give up on EVA for a while before stumbling on this post.
At least you can fix your staging while in flight. Just use the normal + / - buttons by the staging windows and rearrange everything.
